attributes.action: Change the May Day Bank Holiday to 'A Day For England'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We Are hoping that by changing the May Day Bank Holiday to 'A Day For England' it will give a sense of unity and pride to all Englishmen and women, of all colour, creed or religion. We are hoping that the general public will take this concept to their heart and feel empowered to organise street parties in their neighbourhoods. We are also asking that the Mayor of London will grant our wish for a large street party in London, prehaps Trafalgar Square.
